pageContext.title: In brief: Grab takes the fight to Go-Jek in Indonesia
pageContext.content:
Grab has announced an expansion plan to capture millions of smartphone users by offering food delivery and travel services that will take Go-Food and Traveloka head on. Grab co-founder Hooi Tai Ling said the company will focus its efforts in Indonesia next year. Its plan includes introducing Booking.com for flight ticket and accommodation booking, and China’s Ping-An Good Doctor for medicine delivery and consultation booking.

Source: The Jakarta Post

seo.title: In brief: Grab takes the fight to Go-Jek in Indonesia
seo.description: Grab will focus on food delivery and travel services for its expansion in the country.
